resources.textures.texture2D

Class DynamicTexture2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • resources.textures.AbstractTexture
      • resources.textures.DynamicTexture
        • resources.textures.texture2D.DynamicTexture2D
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Resource, Texture, Texture2D

    public class DynamicTexture2D
extends DynamicTexture
implements Texture2D
    Dynamic texture for FBO attachments.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DynamicTexture2D

        public DynamicTexture2D(@NotNull
                        Fbo.FboAttachmentSlot attachmentType,
                        @NotNull
                        org.joml.Vector2i size,
                        boolean floatingPoint,
                        boolean multisampled,
                        int samples,
                        @Nullable
                        java.nio.ByteBuffer image)
        Initializes a new DynamicTexture to the given parameter.
        Parameters:
        attachmentType - texture's attachment type
        size - texture's width and height
        floatingPoint - texture store color attachments as floating point values or not
        multisampled - multisampled
        samples - number of samples, if the texture isn't multisampled, it can be anything
        image - texture's image data, if the texture is multisampled, it doesn't used
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - attachmentType and size can't be null
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - width and height must be positive
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - samples can't be lower than 1
